ui.needLogin: You need to be logged in to save!
ui.confirmHangar: Go to Hangar? Current flight progress will be lost.
ui.saveProgressPrompt: Would you like to SAVE your progress before exiting to the main menu?
ui.exitNoSavePrompt: Are you sure? Unsaved progress will be lost.
ui.exitToMenuPrompt: Progress will NOT be saved (Guest Mode). Continue?

settings.title: SETTINGS & CONTROLS
settings.saveConfirmMsg: This will update your profile and controls.

hangar.startNewPrompt: Start a new rocket? Current rocket will be lost if not saved.
hangar.pleaseEnterName: Please enter a name for your rocket

chronology.title: SPACE CONQUEST
chronology.subtitle: CHRONOLOGY
chronology.selectEvent: Select an event to view details

sputnik1.title: Sputnik 1
sputnik1.desc: The Soviet Union launches the first artificial satellite, marking the start of the Space Age.

sputnik2.title: Sputnik 2
sputnik2.desc: First animal in orbit (Laika). Proved living passengers could survive launch.

explorer1.title: Explorer 1
explorer1.desc: First US satellite. Discovered the Van Allen radiation belts.

nasaFormed.title: NASA Formed
nasaFormed.desc: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration is established.

luna2.title: Luna 2
luna2.desc: First human-made object to impact the Moon.

luna3.title: Luna 3
luna3.desc: First photographs of the far side of the Moon.

vostok1.title: Vostok 1
vostok1.desc: Yuri Gagarin becomes the first human in space (Orbit).

freedom7.title: Freedom 7
freedom7.desc: Alan Shepard becomes the first American in space (Suborbital).

friendship7.title: Friendship 7
friendship7.desc: John Glenn orbits Earth. First US orbital flight.

vostok6.title: Vostok 6
vostok6.desc: Valentina Tereshkova becomes the first woman in space.

voskhod2.title: Voskhod 2
voskhod2.desc: Alexei Leonov performs the first Spacewalk (EVA).

gemini4.title: Gemini 4
gemini4.desc: First US Spacewalk by Ed White.

gemini8.title: Gemini 8
gemini8.desc: First docking of two spacecraft in orbit.

saturnv.title: Saturn V
saturnv.desc: First all-up launch of the massive Saturn V rocket (Apollo 4).

apollo1.title: Apollo 1 Fire
apollo1.desc: Tragedy strikes the Apollo program. Three astronauts lost.

apollo8.title: Apollo 8
apollo8.desc: First crewed spacecraft to orbit the Moon.

apollo11.title: Apollo 11
apollo11.desc: Humans walk on the Moon. 'One giant leap for mankind'.

voyager1.title: Voyager 1
voyager1.desc: Launch of the probe that would leave the solar system.

sts1.title: STS-1 Columbia
sts1.desc: First flight of the reusable Space Shuttle.

hubble.title: Hubble
hubble.desc: Deployment of the Hubble Space Telescope.

issZarya.title: ISS Zarya
issZarya.desc: First module of the International Space Station.

curiosity.title: Curiosity Rover
curiosity.desc: Landing of the massive rover on Mars via Skycrane.

falcon9.title: Falcon 9 Landing
falcon9.desc: SpaceX lands an orbital booster for the first time.

crewDragon.title: Crew Dragon
crewDragon.desc: First commercial crew launch to ISS.

jamesWebb.title: James Webb
jamesWebb.desc: Launch of the most advanced space telescope.

artemis3.title: Artemis III
artemis3.desc: Return of humans to the Lunar surface.

marsSample.title: Mars Sample Return
marsSample.desc: Robotic return of soil samples from Mars.

marsHumans.title: First Humans on Mars
marsHumans.desc: Human footprint on the Red Planet.

titanColony.title: Titan Colony
titanColony.desc: Outpost established on Saturn's moon Titan.

proxima.title: Proxima Centauri
proxima.desc: Launch of the first relativistic lightsail probe.
